name: Post Factory
description:
Little game made during the Global Game Jam 2k18

Controls

LMB :

  - Menu : Select

  - Empty Space : Create Machine selected if enough money

  - On some machines : Change Color Type

RMB :

  - On machines : Destroy without recover money

A :  

  - Enable auto-Rotate Conveyors

R :  

  - On machines : Rotate

Enjoy
